acquirer_response_code.description: the raw acquirer response code to the authorization request

address_verification_response_code.description: This is the AVs response code

authorization_id.description: id assigned by the acquirer for the authorization

card_verification_response_code.description: This is the CVV2 response code

international_card_flag.description: This flag indicates if this transaction was made with a international card

network_unique_id.description: Global or domestic network id assigned to the transaction

prepaid_card_flag.description: This flag indicates if this transaction was made with a pre-paid card

psp_name.description: Name of the payment service provider

response_time.description: The delta (in seconds) between when Modo sends a request to psp and receives the response

status_code.description: The status code returned during the processing of the payment

status_message.description: The status message (human readable) returned during the processing of the payment
